title: Australian achievement
brief_description: This film showcases the production of McPherson’s “Macson” lathe featuring footage of a production line in a Holden car plant, the launch of a P.J. Adams of London ship, and sections of the power grid. Provides a detailed explanation of lathe production, including footage of the research laboratory undertaking improvement in design right up to the point of the final stage of lathes being packed for export.
